subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Indiana Pacers, the team that gave Isiah Thomas his coaching start, ruined his home opener on Saturday night while fans turned their anger toward Stephon Marbury, who received a technical foul for kicking the ball.
snippet: The Indiana Pacers, the team that gave Isiah Thomas his coaching start, ruined his home opener on Saturday night while fans turned their anger toward Stephon Marbury, who received a technical foul for kicking the ball.
